Fit.rationale: Above-average operator with strong product, P&L and ML experience and history scaling teams and consumer products — relevant to leading an early-stage AI startup. Gaps: no explicit founder/CEO title, limited evidence of directly leading/closing seed rounds, and no mental-health or regulated-healthcare experience. Best positioned as a product-led CEO/operator who prepares companies for seed fundraising by leveraging PE investor-facing experience, ML/product leadership, and GTM track record.

Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: CRYSTAL PEAK CAPITAL Operating Executive (PE context) — investor exposure implied; no closed seed/VC rounds listed
Gap_Map.Gap handling: Add - clarify personal role in raising/closing rounds and amounts

Gap_Map.JD Requirement/Keyword: Founder or early-stage executive / CEO experience (High)
Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: Senior exec roles (CPO/GM, EVP) with early-stage startup ADNOVA and others, but no founder/CEO title
Gap_Map.Gap handling: Rephrase - highlight early-stage product launches and company pivots

Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: HOMEQUEST: ML features; FINANCIA: founded data science group; ADNOVA: data/product innovations
Gap_Map.Gap handling: Rephrase - quantify ML scope/team/tech in answers

Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: No mental-health or clinical domain roles referenced
Gap_Map.Gap handling: Add - ask about any mental-health work, advisors, or motivation

Gap_Map.JD Requirement/Keyword: Product development from POC to market (Med)
Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: Multiple launches, pivots, and monetization initiatives across roles but no explicit POC-to-market in healthcare/AI context
Gap_Map.Gap handling: Rephrase - emphasize customer iteration and POC/early-customer work

Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: Rebuilt product team, founded data science group, led ~140-person team at HOMEQUEST
Gap_Map.Gap handling: Rephrase - mirror JD: 'recruit & scale engineering/research teams' wording

Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: No regulated industry or healthcare examples
Gap_Map.Gap handling: Add - ask about any regulatory/compliance exposure or advisors

Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: HOMEQUEST and FINANCIA bullets on GTM, monetization, conversion lifts

Gap_Map.JD Requirement/Keyword: Investor/advisor network in tech or mental health (Low)
Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: CRYSTAL PEAK role implies investor interactions; no explicit investor network listed
Gap_Map.Gap handling: Add - ask about relevant investor/advisor contacts

Gap_Map.JD Requirement/Keyword: Located or willing to travel to SF Bay Area (Low)
Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: Located in Riverside, NY; no Bay Area travel/relocation info
Gap_Map.Gap handling: Add - ask candidate willingness to travel/relocate

Questions: Have you personally led or closed any seed or early-stage VC rounds? If yes, list role (lead/co-lead/advisor), amount(s), and year(s).
For your ML/AI work: what was your hands-on scope (product strategy, model selection, data pipelines), and what was the ML team size you hired or led?
Do you have any direct experience, advisors, partnerships, or projects in mental health / healthcare or regulatory compliance? If yes, briefly describe.
What else should I know about you and this job?
